issue.title: [C++/Python] Construct List container from offsets and values subarrays
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-507](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-507). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is the inverse operation from flattening a list type into its child values (dropping the offsets)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-507?focusedCommentId=16089191) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Moving this to 0.6.0. I added a preliminary implementation in the patch for ARROW-1177, but to make it complete, we need to handle "sanitizing" offsets that contain nulls (replacing the null values with the previous value) and adding unit tests to validate.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-507?focusedCommentId=16215924) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved by PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1224
